title: Faculty Development and Strategic Recruitment Strategies for Enhancing Digital Learning Design Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: General experience using digital devices and understanding of foundational instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Providing educational design experiences that simulate real classroom environments through VR-based learning simulations, including collaborative learning and feedback system development

learning_goals: One can design one language learning scenario in a VR environment by applying the five-stage digital learning design process
One can evaluate their own digital design competencies in three or more areas using an instructor competency diagnostic tool
One can propose three hiring criteria for digital learning design experts using a strategic recruitment framework
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
